amendment.description: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 115-830 to reduce by $20,000,000 and then increase by the same amount the National Recreation and Preservation account with intent to use the funds for the National Maritime Heritage grant program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Olson amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Olson.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Olson amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
